command.name: moveTo
command.summary: Moves the pen to a specified position.

command.name: drawTo
command.summary: Draws a line from the current position to the specified position.

command.name: rectangle
command.summary: Draws a rectangle at the current position.

command.name: circle
command.summary: Draws a circle at the current position.

command.name: triangle
command.summary: Draws a triangle based on the provided coordinates.
command.param: The x-coordinate of the first vertex.
The y-coordinate of the first vertex.
The x-coordinate of the second vertex.
The y-coordinate of the second vertex.
The x-coordinate of the third vertex.
The y-coordinate of the third vertex.

command.name: color
command.summary: Sets the color of the pen.

command.name: reset
command.summary: Resets the pen position to the top-left corner of the drawing area.

command.name: fill
command.summary: Toggles the fill mode for shapes.
